mapper.select: SELECT dad.app_id, dad.id, dad.project_id, dad.env_id, dad.value_id, dad.task_name, dad.trigger_version, dad.object_version_number, dadv.VALUE, dad.instance_name, dad.instance_id, dad.is_enabled FROM devops_auto_deploy dad LEFT JOIN devops_auto_deploy_value dadv ON dad.value_id = dadv.id WHERE dad.id = #{autoDeployId}

SELECT dad.app_id, dad.id, dad.project_id, dad.env_id, dad.value_id, dad.task_name, dad.created_by, dad.instance_name, dad.instance_id, dadv.VALUE FROM devops_auto_deploy dad LEFT JOIN devops_auto_deploy_value dadv ON dad.value_id = dadv.id WHERE dad.app_id = #{appId} AND dad.is_enabled=1
AND (dad.trigger_version LIKE CONCAT('%', #{branch},'%') OR dad.trigger_version = '')
AND dad.trigger_version = ''

SELECT dad.app_id, dad.id, dad.project_id, dad.env_id, dad.value_id, dad.task_name, dad.trigger_version, dad.object_version_number, dad.instance_name FROM devops_auto_deploy dad WHERE dad.project_id = #{projectId} AND dad.task_name = #{taskName}
AND dad.id != #{id}
